abstract: Under the latest timetable, Alibaba will hope to price its stock sale toward the later half of the week of Sept. 15, a person briefed on the matter said.
snippet: Under the latest timetable, Alibaba will hope to price its stock sale toward the later half of the week of Sept. 15, a person briefed on the matter said.
lead_paragraph: Investors hoping to finally buy a piece of the Alibaba Group will have to wait a little longer.

headline.main: Alibaba to Begin Investor Roadshow in Week of Sept. 8

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
